text: Rolf Böhme (6 August 1934 – 12 February 2019) was a German politician who was the mayor of Freiburg for 20 years between 1982 and 2002. He was a member of the Social Democratic Party (SPD). Before becoming Mayor, he was a member of the German parliament (Bundestag) between 1972 and 1982. From 1978 until 1982, he was also deputy minister of the Finance Ministry of the German Federal Republic (Parliamentarischer Staatssekretär). Böhme was born on 6 August 1934 in Konstanz and died on 12 February 2019 in Freiburg im Breisgau at the age of 84.Freiburgs früherer Oberbürgermeister Rolf Böhme gestorben == References == Category:1934 births Category:2019 deaths Category:German mayors Category:Politicians of the Social Democratic Party of Germany Category:Politicians from Baden-Württemberg Category:People from Konstanz Category:People from Freiburg im Breisgau Category:Order of Merit of the Federal Republic of Germany
title: Rolf Böhme
